title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Victory ata Mile High
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)


── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ──
✔ ggplot2 3.4.0      ✔ purrr   1.0.1 
✔ tibble  3.1.8      ✔ dplyr   1.0.10
✔ tidyr   1.2.1      ✔ stringr 1.5.0 
✔ readr   2.1.3      ✔ forcats 0.5.2 
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()


Code
high <- read_csv("/Users/wyattsteffes/Desktop/High Text.csv")


New names:
Rows: 30 Columns: 31
── Column specification
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr
(2): Team, Arena dbl (26): Rk, Age, W, L, PW, PL, MOV, SOS, SRS, ORtg, DRtg,
NRtg, Pace, FTr,... lgl (3): ...18, ...23, ...28
ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ℹ
Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
• `` -> `...18`
• `eFG%` -> `eFG%...19`
• `TOV%` -> `TOV%...20`
• `FT/FGA` -> `FT/FGA...22`
• `` -> `...23`
• `eFG%` -> `eFG%...24`
• `TOV%` -> `TOV%...25`
• `FT/FGA` -> `FT/FGA...27`
• `` -> `...28`


Code
high2 <- high %>%
  select(Team, W, L) %>%
mutate(SeasonTotal = W +L)
  
ggplot() + 
  geom_bar(data=high2, aes(x=reorder(Team, W), weight=W, fill=SeasonTotal)) + 
  coord_flip()

library(tidyverse)

dub <- read_csv("/Users/wyattsteffes/Desktop/dub.csv")

New names:
Rows: 82 Columns: 15
── Column specification
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr
(8): Date, Start (ET), ...5, ...6, Opponent, ...8, ...9, Streak dbl (5): G, Tm,
Opp, W, L lgl (2): ...4, Notes

# A tibble: 6 × 15
      G Date     Start…¹ ...4  ...5  ...6  Oppon…² ...8  ...9     Tm   Opp     W
  <dbl> <chr>    <chr>   <lgl> <chr> <chr> <chr>   <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
1     1 Wed Oct… 9:00p   NA    Box … @     Utah J… L     <NA>    102   123     0
2     2 Fri Oct… 10:00p  NA    Box … @     Golden… W     <NA>    128   123     1
3     3 Sat Oct… 9:00p   NA    Box … <NA>  Oklaho… W     <NA>    122   117     2
4     4 Mon Oct… 10:00p  NA    Box … @     Portla… L     <NA>    110   135     2
5     5 Wed Oct… 10:00p  NA    Box … <NA>  Los An… W     <NA>    110    99     3
6     6 Fri Oct… 9:00p   NA    Box … <NA>  Utah J… W     <NA>    117   101     4
# … with 3 more variables: L <dbl>, Streak <chr>, Notes <lgl>, and abbreviated
#   variable names ¹​`Start (ET)`, ²​Opponent

ggplot() +
  geom_point(data=dub, aes(x=Date, y=Tm))
